title: Academic Essays & Professional Reports
description: Write sophisticated academic and professional texts with nuanced arguments.

exercises.title: Argumentative Essay
exercises.prompt: Some experts argue that artificial intelligence will fundamentally transform the job market, while others believe its impact will be more limited. Present a nuanced argument discussing both perspectives and your own position.
guidelines: Include an introduction with a clear thesis statement
Present at least two supporting arguments with evidence
Conclude with a synthesis of your main points

sampleOutline.introduction: Introduction presenting the debate and your thesis
sampleOutline.body1: First perspective: AI will fundamentally transform employment
sampleOutline.body2: Second perspective: Impact will be more limited than feared
sampleOutline.body3: Your nuanced position: reconciling both views

exercises.title: Executive Summary
exercises.prompt: Write an executive summary of a hypothetical research project that examined the relationship between remote work policies and employee productivity. Include key findings and recommendations.
guidelines: Begin with the purpose of the research
Present 2-3 key findings with supporting data

sampleOutline.purpose: This report delineates the findings of...
sampleOutline.recommendations: Based on these findings, we recommend...

exercises.title: Critical Response
exercises.prompt: Read the following claim and write a critical response: 'Social media has had a predominantly negative impact on society and should be more heavily regulated.'
guidelines: Evaluate the claim's strengths and weaknesses
Support your analysis with reasoning and examples

sampleOutline.evaluation: While this claim has some merit, it requires scrutiny...
sampleOutline.counterpoints: However, empirical evidence suggests a more nuanced picture...
sampleOutline.synthesis: A more cogent argument would acknowledge both...
